messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
ATTENTION ALL CREW MEMBERS:
NanoTrasen has been purchased by the ShadyCigs Corporation. Please pay the due respect this giants of buisness deserve and smoke as much as you can! Thank you.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: enjoy your new space bar now looks 70% more like space

messages.author: Captain's Desk
messages.body: Call security if you have some information about hostile

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
ShadyCigs Space Division Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed moderate level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Just a reminder to get out there and smoke the cigars!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I HAVE THE CAPTAIN AS A HOSTAGE

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: ALL OF YOU ARE GAY SO IM TAKING HIS BATON AND RUNNING

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Antoine Chretien. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Just a reminder that not smoking may result in termination of your job. Have a good day!

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Hello, daddy's princesses. Your daddy, the HoS speaking. Whoever these fucking "lings" are, they will all be dead by the end of that hour. Use PDA to talk to me, I am too busy for listening to your screams.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Antoine Chretien. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Suit sensors on so we can atleast know when you die

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to intense drop of stocks we are liquidating Shady Cig INC.
